𓆎 󳷗 󳷕 󳷘 󳷙 𓏠 kämmen kamm ≠ 𓍛 ḥm

𓆎 ≈ 𒈪 GIǦ.MI "dark" ≈ Khmi in form, sound and meaning

𓆎 ≈ 𒅸 KA×MI kana₅

𓆎 ≈ 𜎦 in 𜎦𜑊𜐶 Menik malik Menes König 𒎗 •karm?

𓆎 𓅓 𓏏 𓊖 •Kurmuzur 𒆳𒈬𒀫 Kur.muṣur Khmet ⲕⲏⲙⲉ kēme™ "Egypt"

𓆎 𓅓 𓏏 𓊖 •Kurmuzur 𓇾 𓂋 𓌻 𓇋 𓈙 𓊖 CarRaMišUr 𒆳𒈬𒀫 Mizraim

𓆎 Kamm ⇔ K-R-M / K-M-R

𓆎 a) "barb, spike, sting, prick, quill" b) scales e.g. of hedgehog / crocodile 𓆎 Akkadian: ḫummu “thorn, sting” 𒋙 𒁹+𒌋 𐎘 𒄩_𒉡 ḫa-zan-nu 𓆎 Sumerian: kam “spike, thorn” 𒁾𒆕 𒀉 𒅊 𒃵 gurum ? @ 𒆪𒉺𒅁𒆪 𒀀𒊭𒄖 ? 𓆎 Greek: akmē ἀκμή “point, tip, peak” 𓆎 Latin: acumen “point, sharpness”

  1. 𓆎 Kamm ⇔ 𓈉 Karim (Bergkämme) hump @ camel 🐫 𒃵𒂷 🐪 ≈ 𓃘 ≈ 𒀲
  2. 𓆎 Kamm cockscomb 🐔 🦚
  3. 𓆎 chemie:khemeth 𓐍 𓅓 = black 𓆎 𒈪 chrome
  4. 𓆎 Kermit 𓆈 caiman 𓆊 𓆌 𓆎 champsai ⋍ ⲉⲙⲥⲁϩ 𓆎 𓅓 𓊃 𓎛 𓆊 ⲉmzḥ ⲉ
  5. 𓆎 Kermit 𓆈 سوسْمار susmâr sisamavilik salamander חַרדוֹן khardón lizard
  6. 𓆎 Kermit 𓆈 хьамплъыжь ḥamplˢəź gremxula lizard
  7. 𓆎 comb Saum seam … chain 𓊃 zahn 𓄑 žam̃ba γομφίος gomphíos 🦷 जम्भ jambha jaw 角
  8. 𓆎 cometheor 𓇍 𓆎 ☄
  9. 𓆎 charmth=warmth ⇔ zünd𓍑 𓆎🔥 charm > κάμινος káminos Kamin => 𓆎
  10. 𓆎 calm, complete, perfect 𓆎 𓅓 𓏜 कामिल kāmil комил komil کامل kâmel ⇔ 𓏏𓍃𓅓 تَمَام tamām
  11. 𓆎 comput Σ 𓊃𓊪𓊗 count 𓈞𓏏𓄰 𓆎 𓅓 𓏜 sum 𓇳sambe 𓎆𓎆𓎆 𓋬
  12. 𓆎 comput > Copt
  13. 𓆎 𓏛 complete 𓆎 𓅓 𓏜 कमाल kamāl کمال kamâl كَامِل kāmil complete => أَكْمَل ʾakmal 𒀝𒈬𒊏 agmura
  14. 𓆎 Kamm ⲭⲏⲙⲓ khēmi 𓆎 ⲕⲏⲙⲉ kēmes Egypt khemt comet ☄ meteorᶥᵐ mithraim
  15. 𓆎 Chimera, one of Greeks mythological arch-enemies
  16. 𓆎 khám : 𓋴 𓆎 𓅓 𓁸 wise, sage < sakam > חָכָם ḫakhám +++
  17. 𓆎 𓏏 𓀀 𓁐 𓏥 Common copt = egyptian oecumene 𒅴 / κοινή Koiní

𓈎 𓈍 𓈋 culmen “height, top, crown” column 𓆎 𓆈 𓏠 𓋔 𓋑 𓎝

𒂊𒈬 ᶜe-mu
𒂊𒈬 (be)come, to become, tongue of a plow “Kamm”
